Snehebatu.name: Snehebatu
Snehebatu.preUnlockMessage: The green snake expects a gift...

Arctis.name: Arctis
Arctis.majorBonus: This character is always active within the Lab Mainframe. However, they will not gain any Lab EXP!
Arctis.passiveBonus: +{ Talent LV for all talents above Lv 1
Arctis.preUnlockMessage: The fierce bear awaits a gesture...

Nobisect.name: Nobisect
Nobisect.majorBonus: All kills count for 2x more kills for opening portals and accumulating Deathnote kills.

Harriep.name: Harriep
Harriep.majorBonus: This character produces 3x more resources at 3d Printer! Works with the Lab Bonus, but won't affect the displayed printer amount.

Goharut.name: Goharut
Goharut.majorBonus: Being connected to the Lab also counts as being present at the Divinity Altar, so you get gains for both!
Goharut.preUnlockMessage: The horned one desires a sacrifice...

Omniphau.name: Omniphau
Omniphau.majorBonus: When claiming non-candy AFK gains, also progress one of the following by the AFK time! (Refinery, 3D Printer, Cooking, Pet Breeding, Sailing, or Gaming)
Omniphau.preUnlockMessage: The wise one stares beyond you...

Purrmep.name: Purrmep
Purrmep.majorBonus: All characters produce 2x more Divinity, and get 2x more Divinity EXP! @ Only 1 player can link to Purrmep
Purrmep.passiveBonus: +{% Boat Sailing speed and +{% Gaming Plant grow speed

Flutterbis.name: Flutterbis
Flutterbis.majorBonus: Whenever you level up a skill thats over Lv 50, a Divinity Pearl will drop which gives +40% exp to any skill under Lv 50!

Kattlekruk.name: Kattlekruk
Kattlekruk.majorBonus: I am not yet prepared to bestow upon you my bonus, give me some time. You may link with me, but nothing will come of it.
Kattlekruk.preUnlockMessage: A present for what was the past...

Bagur.name: Bagur
Bagur.majorBonus: I am not yet prepared to bestow upon you my bonus, give me some time. You may link with me, but nothing will come of it.
